resources.string:
"Sebenzisa Isihlelamsindo nama-headphone ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yomsindo okuzungezile noma kudivayisi yakho. Isihlelamsindo senza imisindo ebuthakathaka ibe phezulu ngaphandle kokwenza imisindo enamandla ibange umsindo kakhulu.
Indlela yokusebenzisa Isihlelamsindo: • Xhuma ama-headphone anentambo noma xhuma ama-headphone we-Bluetooth • Qala Isihlelamsindo"
